QuestData.Title: Hornet Hunting
QuestData.Description: We're always looking for new game around here. Daryl may like his boars, but the rest of us prefer things more exotic.$B$BNow, I'd never say the Loch draining was a good thing, but it did have a silver lining. The swampy ground's brought in new prey: Hornets!$B$BGiant hornets, mind you. Not many hunters have tussled with massive bugs before. It's rather novel.$B$BIf you'd like to give it a try, I'll wager with you. Bring me back some of those nice glossy wings of theirs and I'll pay up.
QuestData.RewardText: Lovely specimens you've got there! Here's my wager, $glad:lass;.
